Description: (Re)ingest documents via NeuroSync-Master. Supports ALL documents, single document, or multiple documents
Deletes one or more vector documents from the system
Get latest status for a single document by document ID
Request Payload:
Query Parameters:
- document_id (string): the document identifier
Response: JSON response with document status information
Status Codes:
200: Success
400: Bad Request (missing document_id)
4xx: Client Error
5xx: Server Error
